Key Match Events: The Utah Jazz never led during the game and were forced to play their best players all the way to the final seconds because the Jazz wouldn't let up.
Pre-Game Insights: The Jazz were missing several key players due to injuries.
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Will Hardy expressed disappointment with the team's cold shooting performance, particularly from 3-point range.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cody Williams, a rookie from Utah who grew up in Gilbert, Arizona, had his best game of the season with 13 points against the Suns.
Others: Jordan Clarkson joined the broadcast during the second quarter to comment on the game and discuss various topics related to the Jazz.
